SUBSECTION.TITLE: Using a standard main
SUBSECTION.LABEL: sec:tradimain
SUBSECTION.P: Some application may require to use the traditional main function name instead of pm2_main. This can be enabled through the standard_main option of the Marcel flavor. This option defines the STANDARD_MAIN compilation flag, to be used for each of the PM2 programs. Note that this may affect the performance of several thread management functions. Users are therefore discouraged to do this unless explicitly required.
